Application.Name: TorrentWatch-X
Application.Author: Wiebel
Application.Description: TorrentWatch-X is a web based tool to automate downloads of tv shows via torrents and rss. Based on the torrentwatch project (now known as NMTDVR).
Application.Changelog: -- Improved overall performance. -- Added matching counter on tabs. -- some other minor UI enhancements. -- made regexp matching default, simple will be removed in the future. -- updated guessing routine. -- Fixed issue where default config on NMT would give errors on devices with a sata drive. -- Fixed issue that could cause a high load on pch devies and other slower systems. (Thanks Allan for noticing) -- Fixed issue causing torrents that failed to be added to transmission still got cached. (Thanks Henk for noticing) -- Fixed a bunch of other small bugs.
